mapper.select: SELECT /* OtherPartProductMapper.getPartProductList, IAP상품 정보 조회, 정희원/SKP, 2014-03-25 */ PTPROD.PROD_ID, CDESC.PROD_NM, TPRC.PROD_AMT, APROD.PROD_CASE, APROD.PROD_KIND, PRPROD.PROD_ID AS PARENT_PROD_ID, PRPROD.TOP_MENU_ID AS PARENT_TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD PTPROD INNER JOIN TB_DP_APP_PROD APROD ON APROD.PROD_ID = PTPROD.PROD_ID AND APROD.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_DESC CDESC ON CDESC.PROD_ID = PTPROD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE TPRC ON TPRC.PROD_ID = PTPROD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RSHP ON RSHP.PART_PROD_ID = PTPROD.PROD_ID AND RSHP.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010801' INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD PRPROD ON PRPROD.PROD_ID = RSHP.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND APROD.AID = #{aid} AND CDESC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TPRC.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TPRC.APPLY_START_DT AND TPRC.APPLY_END_DT
